Lunarpine smelled burning fur through the flames. Ice found Grizzltron in
the cave, alive but not well. Lunarpine transformed to his half wolf mode
and started back up the hillside toward the smoking cave. "I suppose we
gotta go in and save him." he said in a somewhat sarcastic tone.

Ice used her telekinettic powers to move debris away from the cave.
Lunarpine forced his way back inside.

(Do you want him saved or is there to much trouble tpo get to him?)


----- Original Message -----
From: Beast Wars AKA Proto <beastwars@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, June 23, 2001 10:06 PM
Subject: Re: what ever happened to Grizzltron?


�Grizzltron�


   Grizzltron landed on the cave floor hard.  The flames effused him.  With
his last bit of strength he yelled out, "Beast mode."  Turning into a
grizzle bear.  He went to stasis lock letting his internal repairs slowly
heal him.  The fire from the bombs were quickly going out from the melting
ice.
